package.name: @website/sugarcss-coffeekraken-io
package.description: The frontend toolkit that works for everyone. Experts, professionals and new-comers
package.author: Olivier Bossel <olivier.bossel@gmail.com> (https://coffeekraken.io)

docblocks.name: Border color
docblocks.description: These classes allows you to apply some border color to any HTMLElement

s-border-current.name: s-border:current
s-border-current.description: Apply the border color current to any HTMLElement

s-border-main.name: s-border:main
s-border-main.description: Apply the border color main to any HTMLElement

s-border-accent.name: s-border:accent
s-border-accent.description: Apply the border color accent to any HTMLElement

s-border-complementary.name: s-border:complementary
s-border-complementary.description: Apply the border color complementary to any HTMLElement

s-border-success.name: s-border:success
s-border-success.description: Apply the border color success to any HTMLElement

s-border-warning.name: s-border:warning
s-border-warning.description: Apply the border color warning to any HTMLElement

s-border-error.name: s-border:error
s-border-error.description: Apply the border color error to any HTMLElement

s-border-info.name: s-border:info
s-border-info.description: Apply the border color info to any HTMLElement

example.title: Border color
example.code:
current
main
accent
complementary
success
warning
error
info

docblocks.raw:
/** * * @name Border color * @namespace sugar.style.helpers.border * @type Styleguide * @menu Styleguide / Helpers /styleguide/helpers/border-color * @platform css * @status stable * * These classes allows you to apply some border color to any HTMLElement * * @support chromium * @support firefox * @support safari * @support edge * * @cssClass s-border:current Apply the border color current to any HTMLElement * @cssClass s-border:main Apply the border color main to any HTMLElement * @cssClass s-border:accent Apply the border color accent to any HTMLElement * @cssClass s-border:complementary Apply the border color complementary to any HTMLElement * @cssClass s-border:success Apply the border color success to any HTMLElement * @cssClass s-border:warning Apply the border color warning to any HTMLElement * @cssClass s-border:error Apply the border color error to any HTMLElement * @cssClass s-border:info Apply the border color info to any HTMLElement * * @install css * @s.border.classes; * * @example html Border color *
*
* current *
*
* main *
*
* accent *
*
* complementary *
*
* success *
*
* warning *
*
* error *
*
* info *
*
* * @since 2.0.0 * @author Olivier Bossel (https://coffeekraken.io) */
